sites.name: ClinicalTrials.gov
sites.desc: A database of privately and publicly funded clinical studies conducted around the world.

sites.name: NIH Clinical Research Trials and You
sites.desc: Information about clinical trials and why they matter, from the National Institutes of Health (NIH).

sites.name: European Medicines Agency (EMA) Clinical Trials Database
sites.desc: Database of clinical trials conducted in the European Union (EU) and European Economic Area (EEA).

sites.name: Japan Registry of Clinical Trials
sites.desc: A public platform for the registration of clinical trials conducted in Japan.

sites.name: Chinese Clinical Trial Registry (ChiCTR)
sites.desc: The Chinese Clinical Trial Registry, providing information on clinical trials conducted in China.

sites.name: Clinical Trials Registry - India (CTRI)
sites.desc: The Clinical Trials Registry - India, a freely accessible online registry of clinical trials in India.

sites.name: National Institute for Health and Care Excellence (NICE)
sites.desc: Produces evidence-based guidance and advice for health, public health, and social care practitioners.

sites.name: American College of Cardiology (ACC) Clinical Guidelines
sites.desc: Clinical guidelines from the American College of Cardiology (ACC) covering various cardiovascular conditions.

sites.name: European Society of Cardiology (ESC) Clinical Practice Guidelines
sites.desc: Clinical practice guidelines from the European Society of Cardiology (ESC) on cardiovascular disease management.

sites.name: National Comprehensive Cancer Network (NCCN) Guidelines
sites.desc: Evidence-based clinical practice guidelines for various cancers.

sites.name: United States Medical Licensing Examination (USMLE)
sites.desc: Administers examinations for medical licensure in the United States.

sites.name: European Board of Medical Assessors (EBMA)
sites.desc: Independent organization providing assessment services for medical professionals in Europe.

sites.name: General Medical Council (GMC) - UK
sites.desc: Responsible for registering doctors to practice medicine in the United Kingdom.

sites.name: Bundes√§rztekammer (German Medical Association)
sites.desc: Represents the medical profession in Germany and provides information on medical examinations.

sites.name: Japan Medical Association (JMA)
sites.desc: Provides information on medical examinations and certification in Japan.

sites.name: National Medical Examination Center (NMEC) - China
sites.desc: Responsible for organizing and implementing medical licensing examinations in China.

sites.name: Medical Council of India (MCI)
sites.desc: Regulatory body for medical education and registration of medical practitioners in India.

sites.name: National Council of State Boards of Nursing (NCSBN) - US
sites.desc: Develops and administers the NCLEX-RN and NCLEX-PN examinations for nursing licensure in the United States.

sites.name: Nursing and Midwifery Council (NMC) - UK
sites.desc: Regulates nurses and midwives in the United Kingdom and administers the nursing licensing exam.

sites.name: European Nursing Council (ENC)
sites.desc: Organization working towards standardization of nursing education and examination in Europe.

sites.name: Japan Nursing Association (JNA)
sites.desc: Provides information on nursing certification examinations in Japan.

sites.name: Indian Nursing Council (INC)
sites.desc: Regulatory body for nursing education and practice in India.

sites.name: North American Pharmacist Licensure Examination (NAPLEX)
sites.desc: Standard examination for pharmacists in the United States and Canada.

sites.name: Pharmacy Examining Board of Canada (PEBC)
sites.desc: Provides licensure and certification examinations for pharmacists in Canada.

sites.name: General Pharmaceutical Council (GPhC) - UK
sites.desc: Regulates pharmacists, pharmacy technicians, and pharmacies in the United Kingdom.

sites.name: Bundesapothekerkammer (German Pharmacists Association)
sites.desc: Represents pharmacists in Germany and provides information on licensing examinations.

sites.name: Pharmacy Examining Committee of Canada (PECC)
sites.desc: Regulates pharmacy practice in Canada and administers the Qualifying Examination for pharmacy practice.

sites.name: American Society for Clinical Pathology (ASCP) Board of Certification
sites.desc: Offers various certification examinations for medical laboratory professionals in the United States.

sites.name: Health and Care Professions Council (HCPC) - UK
sites.desc: Regulates health and care professions, including biomedical scientists, in the United Kingdom.

sites.name: Japan Association of Medical Technologists (JAMT)
sites.desc: Provides information on certification examinations for medical technologists in Japan.

sites.name: Indian Association of Medical Technologists (IAMT)
sites.desc: Professional association for medical technologists in India.
